<CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-94.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-55.250000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>64.000000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-94.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-55.250000" maxy="64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>0</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Focal Species (combined) Effort-adjusted Counts, Seasonal - winter]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A summary layer essentially "stacking" the naive species occurrence maps for 24 selected species. This list of species is not inclusive of all important species, but was selected as a representative list for discussion purposes for a June 2011 workshop.  The species are: Audubon's Shearwater, Black-capped Petrel, Black Scoter, Common Loon, Common Murre, Cory's Shearwater, Double-crested Cormorant, Dovekie, Great Black-backed Gull, Great Cormorant, Greater Shearwater, Long-tailed Duck, Northern Fulmar, Northern Gannet, Razorbill, Red Phalarope, Red-necked Phalarope, Roseate Tern, Red-throated Loon, Surf Scoter, Unidentified Cormorant, Unidentified Scoter, White-tailed Tropicbird, White-winged Scoter. This layer displays effort-adjusted counts for the winter season.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-87.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-64.000000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>44.750000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-87.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-64.000000" maxy="44.750000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-87.250000" maxx="44.750000" maxy="-64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-87.250000" maxx="44.750000" maxy="-64.000000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>0</Title>           <LegendURL width="112" height="144">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=0" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>1</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Survey Effort Background, Seasonal - winter]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[All grid cells containing effort during the selected season (in any year) are represented as a no-fill grid for rendering with species occurrence maps. The layer is designed to show only as background for a species map to illustrate no detections for the selected species.  Because effort varies by grid cell, empty cells showing on a species map should be interpreted as \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdnot detected during surveys\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd rather than true absence. This layer represents all grid cells with effort during the winter season.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-94.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-55.250000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>64.000000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-94.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-55.250000" maxy="64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>1</Title>           <LegendURL width="16" height="16">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=1" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>2</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Naive Species Effort-adjusted Counts, Seasonal - Audubon\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Shearwater, winter]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[This is the species data layer showing seasonal naive species occurrence. \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdNaive\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd means that these species counts should not be taken as a direct index of relative abundance, since absence of detections does not imply the species does not occur there. Counts (detections) were adjusted using the five-minute equivalent effort units; however due to biases in methods, these maps combining multiple surveys should be used as \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdpresence\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd maps that strongly reflect survey effort. The data encompass all years but is split out by season for each species; only one species and one season are shown at a time. This layer displays occurrence for Audubon\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Shearwater during the winter season.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-81.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-74.750000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>25.500000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>36.250000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-81.250000" miny="25.500000" maxx="-74.750000" maxy="36.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="25.500000" miny="-81.250000" maxx="36.250000" maxy="-74.750000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="25.500000" miny="-81.250000" maxx="36.250000" maxy="-74.750000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>2</Title>           <LegendURL width="142" height="112">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=2" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>3</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Survey Effort, Decadal all seasons - 2000s]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A layer of effort data summed across all seasons, divided by decade, and represented in five-minute equivalent units. Decades from 1970s onward represent the scientifically collected data, and those are the decades represented here. This layer represents counts from the 2000\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-94.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-55.250000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>64.000000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-94.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-55.250000" maxy="64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>3</Title>           <LegendURL width="166" height="96">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=3" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>4</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Survey Effort, Seasonal all years - winter]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A layer of effort data summed across all dates within each season, and represented in five-minute equivalent units. Winter = Dec, Jan, Feb; and so on. This layer represents winter counts.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-94.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-55.250000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>64.000000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-94.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-55.250000" maxy="64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>4</Title>           <LegendURL width="166" height="96">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=4" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>5</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Survey Effort Total]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A layer of standardized survey effort data summed across all dates and seasons, represented in five-minute equivalent units.  Five minute equivalents were used so that both discrete and continuous transect data could be combined. This unit is essentially "five minutes of survey effort from a vessel traveling 10 knots".]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4269</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-94.250000</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-55.250000</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>24.000000</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>64.000000</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-94.250000" miny="24.000000" maxx="-55.250000" maxy="64.000000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4269" minx="24.000000" miny="-94.250000" maxx="64.000000" maxy="-55.250000"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>5</Title>           <LegendURL width="166" height="96">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://gis1.usgs.gov/arcgis/services/USGS_Patuxent_WRC/Atlantic_Offshore_Seabird_Dataset_Catalog_WMS/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=5" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>     </Layer>   </Capability> </WMS_Capabilities>
